Posts.Content: Jul 23, 2011 02:26PM ILoveMyCello wrote: My mom is on Zometa every three weeks. The first time she had it she ran a low grade fever, but no other side effects. I know you have to inform your dentist when you are on Zometa because there is a chance of jaw necrosis, but my mom's onc says it is very very rare
Posts.Title: Anyone taking Zometa? mlrosen Mary-Lou
